text:
A cache of ammunition was on Sunday found dumped in UBD canal at Malikpur in the district which is on high alert since the attack on the airbase earlier this month.

A few boys, who were taking bath in the Upper Bari Doab canal here, accidentally found the ammunition, the police said.

“As the water level was low, the boys discovered the ammunition lying at the bottom of the canal and then they raised an alarm,” Pathankot DSP (Rural) Kuldeep Singh said.

The investigations are underway, Mr. Singh added. — PTI
title: Ammunition found dumped in canal in Pathankot
